system.description: Phraints are from the southern Teriock deserts and have a hive-like culture in which they are constantly serving the queen. Phraints do not feel emotions though they are often "afraid" of water and incapable of swimming. Most common phraints are green and incapable of going mage, though rarely there are @L[Creature:Red Phraint]{red phraints} which must go mage and only resist fear. Phraint Queenâ€™s are @L[Creature:Gold Phraint]{gold} and extremely rare and the only type that can show emotion (no fear protection),
system.appearance: Phraints look like sexless insectoid people. They are like praying mantises, but with only two arms and two legs.

overview.base: You are @L[Keyword:Incapable]{incapable} of @L[Core:Leveling Up]{training} to be a @L[Category:Mage classes]{mage} and you lose any @L[Category:Mage classes]{mage} ranks you already have.
You have no @L[Core:Movement Speed]{swim speed}. This overrides abilities such as @L[Ability:Swimming]{Swimming}.
@L[Category:Armor]{Armor} you wear must be custom-made to fit you.
You vertically leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{quarter speed} and horizontally leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{half speed}.
overview.proficient: You instead vertically leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{half speed} and horizontally leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{full speed}.

overview.base: You always have at least 2 @L[Core:AV]{AV}. This is the case even when you are not wearing @L[Category:Armor]{armor}.
